comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The photo of the Rt. Hon. Sir George Reid probably dates from his visit to New York in September, 1912, as it is part of the Bain News Agency's 1912 photostream, and Bain's 1918 photos have not yet been posted on Flickr. (As I write this, it is September 2010, and LOC is currently posting Bain's 1914 output.) Story on Sir George, from The New York Times, September 22, 1912 [in it, Reid states that this was his first New York visit in fifteen years]: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F30F1EFD345813...
